Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Affiliate Relations Manager Posted/Updated: 10-17-2015 Brief Job Description: The Affiliate Relations Manager will be responsible for a variety of tasks related to our affiliates, including client management, partnership marketing, renewal negotiations, and strategic planning.
